title: Create Presentation from Final Report
description: An agent must create a 10-slide executive presentation based on a detailed final report document.

tasks.description: Read the final report and extract the key findings from each major section.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the most important conclusions from the report.

tasks.description: Generate a slide outline with a title for each of the 10 slides.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a logical flow for the presentation (e.g., Title, Agenda, Key Findings, Recommendations, Next Steps).

tasks.description: For each slide in the outline, generate 3-5 bullet points summarizing the relevant information from the report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent populates each slide with concise and relevant summary points.
